snippet: In this past week's Ethicist column, a reader explained her decision to boycott a production of "The Nutcracker" because of her political differences with one of its sponsors, David Koch.
abstract: In this past week's Ethicist column, a reader explained her decision to boycott a production of "The Nutcracker" because of her political differences with one of its sponsors, David Koch.
lead_paragraph: In this past week's Ethicist column, Edith Palmer of Brooklyn explained why her political differences with David Koch kept her from taking her granddaughter, Rachel, to see a production of "The Nutcracker" that he sponsored.

headline.main: Baffling Reader Correspondence of the Week
